name: OFFROAD EXTREME-SPIN TIRES
description:
HEY OFFROAD FAN!

OFFROAD EXTREME SPIN TIRES! Enjoy the off-road experience! Try all the vehicles and collect the firewood. Select an optional car, start the engine and turn off the handbrake. You can choose to have a front-wheel drive or rear-wheel drive. If you get stuck just tap the rescue button and you will be in the base starting position.
